definition: cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]
empty cave, nothing there (idiom); devoid of substance/nothing new to show

sentences.english: The total diameter of cavitation, if present, is less than 4cm.
sentences.chinese: 若出現空洞，其直徑總和小於4釐米。

sentences.english: It is tempting to dismiss this trite formulation as a meaningless excuse for inaction.
sentences.chinese: 這種陳詞濫調很容易被嗤爲不作爲的空洞藉口。

sentences.english: But who does such an empty diplomatic process serve?
sentences.chinese: 然而，這樣一場空洞的外交過程究竟對誰有益呢？

sentences.english: Only empty heads and empty hearts can do that.
sentences.chinese: 讓人逡巡徘徊的只能是思想空洞和心靈空虛。

sentences.english: This will lead to years of wasted time and hollow learning.
sentences.chinese: 但這會導致幾年的時間浪費以及空洞的學習。

sentences.english: Microcosmic space is the hollow ball that has limit, it is not the ball of Poincare conjecture.
sentences.chinese: 選擇大型籃或妨礙爲此，一個有很多空洞空間。

sentences.english: Everybody quickly went to the bomb shelter when the alert sounded.
sentences.chinese: 防空警報響起時，大家都快速進了防空洞。

sentences.english: Until recently, the construction of large bomb shelters was mainly the work of governments.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近，建造大型防空洞才成爲政府的主要工作。

sentences.english: Bronchoscope has higher value to the diagnosis of pulmonary cavity.
sentences.chinese: 纖支鏡檢查對肺部空洞性病變的診斷具有較高價值。

sentences.english: Is there an active continuous improvement team for plating voids in the electroless copper operation?
sentences.chinese: 化學沉銅是否對電鍍空洞有積極的持續改善小組？

sentences.english: Friendship is like this, it is inane without friends in one's life.
sentences.chinese: 友誼就應該像這樣，生活中沒有朋友是空洞的。

sentences.english: Liquid penetrant may be used for inspection of defect excavations on all grades.
sentences.chinese: 液體滲透檢測可檢查所有級別的空洞缺陷。

sentences.english: Hollow and abstract tune should sing little here, but some people sing it more.
sentences.chinese: 這裏叫空洞抽象的調子少唱，有些同志卻硬要多唱。
他的說教聽起來很空洞。

sentences.english: Probing into my bad tooth with my tongue, I could feel the enlarged hole.
sentences.chinese: 我用舌頭舔我那顆蟲牙，感到牙齒上的空洞在變大。

sentences.english: Objective To analyse the factors influencing results of surgery of syringomyelia.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析脊髓空洞症外科治療療效的影響因素。

definition: empty cave, nothing there (idiom); devoid of substance/nothing new to show
so deep one cannot see to the bottom/limitless
